creator: dave.carlson@westgroup.com
text:
fo:external-graphic is rendered as block level rather than an inline-level 
object.  This makes it impossible to have a graphic inline with text.

The following snippet will render on three separate lines when I would expect 
everything to render on one line:

<fo:inline font-weight="bold"> Federal Courts <fo:external-graphic 
src="jar:file:/C:/DFA/DocBuilder.jar!/com/westgroup/dfa/writer/Img/key.gif"/>446
</fo:inline>

creator: dave.carlson@westgroup.com
text:
Upgraded to Major severity as this will not even allow two small images to 
appear side by side in a document.  For example we use images for special 
unprintable characters to form simple words.  This bug prevents us from doing 
that.

creator: j3322ptm@yahoo.de
text: Fixed in 0.20.3, even the line height is adjusted.

creator: gadams@apache.org
text: batch transition pre-FOP1.0 resolved+fixed bugs to closed+fixed
